text: Fables of the Reconstruction is the third studio album by alternative rock band R.E.M. and was released on June 10, 1985. It went to number 28 in the United States and number 35 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== All songs written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills and Michael Stipe except where noted. Side one – "Fables of the Reconstruction" #"Feeling Pull" – 4:48 #"Maps and Legends" – 3:10 #"Driver 8" – 3:23 #"Life and How to Live It" – 4:06 #"Old Man Kensey" (Jeremy Ayers, Berry, Buck, Mills, Stipe) – 4:08 Side two – "Reconstruction of the Fables" # * "Cant Get There from Here" – 3:39 #"Green Grow the Rushes" – 3:46 #"Kohoutek" – 3:18 #"Auctioneer (Another Engine)" – 2:44 #"Good Advices" – 3:30 #"Wendell Gee" – 3:01 ==References== Category:1985 albums Category:R.E.M. albums
title: Fables of the Reconstruction
